Play.Header: DET wins toss, elects to Receive, and DAL elects to defend the North goal.
3-B.Cundiff kicks 60 yards from DAL 30 to DET 10. 18-E.Drummond to DET 26 for 16 yards (58-S.Shanle, 29-K.Davis). Return middle.
Detroit Lions at 15:00, (1st play from scrimmage 14:55)

Play.PlayDescription: (14:55) 3-J.Harrington pass to 84-T.Streets to DET 31 for 5 yards (51-A.Singleton). Nguyen of Dallas shaken up on the play; pass complete middle; Harrington fake handoff and roll right.
(14:28) 34-K.Jones up the middle to DET 43 for 12 yards (75-M.Wiley; 41-T.Newman).
(13:45) 34-K.Jones right tackle to DAL 50 for 7 yards (52-D.Coakley).

(11:35) 34-K.Jones up the middle to DAL 1 for no gain (91-L.Carson; 56-B.James).
(11:05) 3-J.Harrington pass to 34-K.Jones for 1 yard, TOUCHDOWN. Play action pass play; ball caught three yards deep right side of the end zone.This is Jones' first career TD pass reception.
4-J.Hanson extra point is GOOD, Center-57-J.Littleton, Holder-2-N.Harris.
